header_Title: Ready to join hundreds of thousands in the strongest and most enjoyable adventure with a comprehensive training program that will help you reach your best version under the supervision of a full team of 7 specialized departments
header_subTitle: Our goal is for the program to put you in a fun stage that makes you happy and in complete comfort, without feeling any psychological pressure or deprivation of your favorite food. You will have a clear and well-thought-out map and plan tailored specifically for you so that you do not get distracted or bored halfway and reach your goal in the fastest time with the best form and complete health

question_6: Do you find it difficult to commit to a plan to reach your goal due to your work circumstances and lack of time?

guarantee_title: Because you have a 30-day full money-back guarantee while keeping the gifts!
guarantee_description: Because we guarantee the quality of what we offer, we grant all trainees a full money-back guarantee while keeping all the gifts valued at over $300 in case there is nothing mentioned on this page
QuestionsFooter_title_main: Do you have some questions in mind before joining us? Here are their answers
QuestionsFooter_title_sub: I'm trying to answer most frequently asked questions
QuestionsFooter_discount_text: Only a few hours left until the offer ends! Get it now
contact_heading_secondary: We are here to answer your inquiries, feel free to contact us
stillHesitant_text: You have a 30-day full money-back guarantee while keeping the gifts!
refund_policy_text: Because we guarantee the quality of what we offer, we grant all trainees 30 days to fully refund the money while keeping all the gifts
refund_policy_note: In case there is nothing promised
refund_policy_content: At Gr7.fit, we are committed to providing high-quality services and ensuring our clients achieve satisfactory results through adherence to our programs and training plans. We understand that each individual is different, which is why we offer a money-back guarantee to ensure your complete satisfaction.
refund_policy_conditions1: 1. Refund Period: Clients can request a refund within 30 days from the date of subscription to any of our training plans.
refund_policy_conditions2: 2. Plan Commitment: The client must demonstrate commitment to the selected program or training plan throughout the subscription period to be eligible for a refund. This includes following all recommended exercises and adhering to dietary guidelines if included.
refund_policy_conditions3: 3. Failure to Achieve Desired Results: The client must provide evidence that, despite committing to the plan, they did not achieve the expected results as specified in the goals of the subscribed program.
refund_policy_conditions4: 4. Refund Process: To initiate the refund process, the client must contact customer service via email or through the contact form available on the website, providing all documents or evidence supporting their request.
refund_policy_conditions5: 5. Refund Processing: Management will review the request and evidence provided and make a decision regarding the refund within 14 days from the date of receiving the request.
refund_policy_additional_note: We at Gr7.fit value the trust of our clients and strive to provide an exceptional training experience. We look forward to helping you achieve your health and fitness goals in the best way possible.
fitness_goals_title: What are your main goals in health and fitness?

fitness_option_2: I exercise regularly because it is beneficial to my health
fitness_option_3: I enjoy exercising for self-improvement and to meet other people
fitness_option_4: I am an athlete aiming for excellence

fitness_goal_option_dumbbell: Dumbbell (one is enough - any suitable weight)
fitness_goal_option_barbell: Barbell (bench, rack, and a wide range of weights)
